ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Profile.Name != 'Data Loader Profile', RecordType.Name == 'Reseller GPP 2.0', Text(Accreditation_Type__c) == 'Maintenance', OR( NOT(OR( Text(Accreditation_Level__c) = 'No Accreditation', Text(Accreditation_Level__c) = 'Basic', Text(Accreditation_Level__c) = 'Premium', Text(Accreditation_Level__c) = 'Professional' ) ), NOT(OR( Text( Pricing_Level_Override__c) = 'No Accreditation', Text(Pricing_Level_Override__c) = 'Basic', Text(Pricing_Level_Override__c) = 'Premium', Text(Pricing_Level_Override__c) = 'Professional', Text(Pricing_Level_Override__c) = 'NBOS', Text(Pricing_Level_Override__c) = '' ) ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Only the following values are allowed: No Accreditation,Nokia Brand of Service, Basic, Premium, Professional
